level.heading: Civil action by city of New York to enjoin interference with access to reproductive health care facilities.
level.text: ยง 8-805. Civil action by city of New York to enjoin interference with access to reproductive health care facilities. The corporation counsel may bring a civil action on behalf of the city in any court of competent jurisdiction for injunctive and other appropriate equitable relief in order to prevent or cure a violation of subdivision a of section 8-803.
